titles.title: Energy for Schools Act
To award grants to assist public schools with the rising costs of fuel for school buses and energy for school buildings.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: 8/1/2008--Introduced. Energy for Schools Act - Directs the Secretary of Education to award grants to: (1) state educational agencies (SEAs) in order to award subgrants to local educational agencies (LEAs) to assist public schools with the increased costs of fuel for school buses and energy for public school buildings; and (2) LEAs that do not receive a subgrant from an SEA.
